# DrawOffSymbolEffect

**Structure**

A symbol effect that applies the DrawOff animation to symbol images.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DrawOffSymbolEffect
```

## Overview

The DrawOff animation makes the symbol hidden either as a whole, or one motion group at a time, animating parts of the symbol with draw data.

## Instance Properties

- **byLayer**: Returns a copy of the effect requesting an animation that applies separately to each motion group.
- **configuration**: The configuration for the effect.
- **individually**: Returns a copy of the effect requesting an animation that applies separately to each motion group, where only one motion group is active at a time.
- **nonReversed**: Returns a copy of the effect requesting an animation that draws off following the draw metadata forwards.
- **reversed**: Returns a copy of the effect requesting an animation that draws off following the draw metadata in reverse.
- **wholeSymbol**: Returns a copy of the effect requesting an animation that applies to all motion groups simultaneously.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- IndefiniteSymbolEffect
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SymbolEffect
- TransitionSymbolEffect
